short.am,ar,bg,bn,da,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_4: Browse your Pinboard bookmarks and add new ones with ease.
short.ca: Navega a través dels teus marcadors Pinboard i afegeix-los amb facilitat.
short.cs: Procházejte vaše Pinboard záložky a snado přidávajte nové.
short.de: Durchsuchen Sie Ihre Pinboard Lesezeichen und verwalten Sie diese mit Leichtigkeit.
short.el: Περιηγηθείτε στον Πίνακα με τους σελιδοδείκτες σας και προσθέστε νέους με ευκολία.
short.es: Navega a través de tus marcadores Pinboard y agrégalos fácilmente.
short.fi: Selaa Pinboard-kirjanmerkkejä ja lisää uusia helposti.
short.fr: Explorez vos marque-pages Pinboard, et ajoutez-en de nouveau facilement.
short.he: נהל את כרטיסיות Pinboard שלך והוסף חדשות בקלות
short.id: Jelajahi bookmark Pinboard Anda dan tambahkan yang baru dengan mudah.
short.nl: Browse door je Pinboard bladwijzers en voeg gemakkelijk nieuwe toe.
short.no: Legg til og bla gjennom Pinboard-bokmerkene dine på en lettvint måte.
short.pl: Przelądaj oraz dodawaj nowe linki do swojego konto na Pinboard.
short.pt_BR: Explore seus favoritos do Pinboard e adicione novos com facilidade.
short.pt_PT: Explore os seus marcadores do Pinboard e adicione novos facilmente.
short.ro: Vezi si adauga semne de carte Pinboard cu usurinta.
short.ru: Просматривайте закладки Pinboard и с легкостью добавляйте новые.
short.sv: Sök bland dina Pinboardbokmärken och lägg enkelt till nya.
short.tr: Pinboard yer işaretlerinizi tarayın ve yenilerini kolaylıkla ekleyin.
short.uk: Переглядайте закладки Pinboard і з легкістю додавайте нові.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PinBuddy is a Google Chrome toolbar extension for the Pinboard (http://pinboard.in) bookmarking service that lets you browse and add new bookmarks with ease. It is fully keyboard accessible and highlights previously bookmarked websites. It uses API token to make a servers calls and never asks you for your password.

- browse and add bookmarks
- fully keyboard accessible
- filter all bookmarks (all view)
- fetch title from document title (add view)
- fetch description from user cursor selection (add view)
- detect URL that is already bookmarked
- default view configurable (options page)
- native system notifications configurable (options page)
- protocol detection
- offline detection

Detailed user manual:
https://pawelgrzybek.com/i-built-a-thing-pinbuddy/
long.pl: PinBuddy is a Google Chrome toolbar extension for the Pinboard (http://pinboard.in) bookmarking service that lets you browse and add new bookmarks with ease. It is fully keyboard accessible and highlights previously bookmarked websites. It uses API token to make a servers calls and never asks you for your password.
